subSections.text: * {{ja-r|灯滅せんとして光を増す|とう めっせん と して ひかり を ます}}

Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=燈|とぼしび}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} ''Same as {{m|ja||ともしび|tr=tomoshibi}} above''

subSections.title: Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|あかし|yomi=k}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|明かす|tr=akasu||to go through the whole night}}.<ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ひ|yomi=k}}

Cognate with and extension of {{m|ja|火|tr=hi||[[fire]]}}.<ref name="DJS"/>

subSections.title: Noun
